items.title: Gene-Editing Breakthrough Ends Transfusions for UK Patient
items.description: UK doctors have delivered a one-time CRISPR therapy to free a woman with beta thalassaemia from lifelong blood transfusions. Medscape News UK

items.title: Biologic Therapies in IBD: Drug Persistence Pattern Explored
items.description: Biologics remain viable options with varying persistence over 1 year in patients with inflammatory bowel disease. Medscape News UK
